entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Alexandria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.1°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:02 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
